Bio

I am a prospective Ph.D. student at Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT), Chemistry department.

I work on ML for Science, especially in bio/organic chemistry and clinical applications.

Previously, I received my double major B.S. in Chemistry (CHEM) with Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) at Seoul National University. I studied about Clinical AI with Mihaela van der Schaar and Changhee Lee , AI-guided drug discovery at AIGENDRUG. Also, I experienced wide and deep research in Biochemistry under Seokhee Kim and Organic synthesis under Dongwhan Lee.
